#summary &vdash; character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesV

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesV V] > &vdash;

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&VDash;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/22ab/index.htm U+022AB].
  * `&Vdash;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/22a9/index.htm U+022A9].
  * `&vDash;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/22a8/index.htm U+022A8].
  * `&vdash;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/22a2/index.htm U+022A2].
